patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+# @format
+
+captainVersion: 4
+services:
+  # Calibre-web
+  $$cap_appname:
+    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/calibre-web:$$cap_app_version
+    restart: always
+    environment:
+      APP_URL: http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain
+      TZ: $$cap_timezone
+      OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE: 1
+      DOCKER_
+    volumes:
+      - $$cap_appname-config:/config
+      - $$cap_appname-books:/books
+    caproverExtra:
+      containerHttpPort: "8083"
+
+caproverOneClickApp:
+  variables:
+    - id: $$cap_app_version
+      label: Calibre-web
+      defaultValue: "0.6.21"
+      description: Check out their docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/calibre-web/tags
+
+    - id: $$cap_timezone
+      label: Timezone
+      defaultValue: "Europe/Berlin"
+      description: "See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for list of timezones."
+
+  instructions:
+    start: >-
+      Calibre-web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an
+      existing Calibre database. It is also possible to integrate google drive and edit metadata and your calibre
+      library through the app itself.
+    end: >-
+      Done! ðŸ˜„ Your service is available at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain Default admin login: Username: admin
+      Password: admin123
+  displayName: "(ARM)Calibre Web"
+  isOfficial: false
+  description:
+    Calibre-web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing
+    Calibre database.
+  documentation: https://github.com/janeczku/calibre-web

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -9,9 +9,9 @@
     environment:
       APP_URL: http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain
       TZ: $$cap_timezone
       OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE: 1
-      DOCKER_
+      DOCKER_MODS: linuxserver/mods:universal-calibre
     volumes:
       - $$cap_appname-config:/config
       - $$cap_appname-books:/books
     caproverExtra:
@@ -42,48 +42,4 @@
   description:
     Calibre-web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing
     Calibre database.
   documentation: https://github.com/janeczku/calibre-web

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# @format

captainVersion: 4
services:
  # Calibre-web
  $$cap_appname:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/calibre-web:$$cap_app_version
    restart: always
    environment:
      APP_URL: http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain
      TZ: $$cap_timezone
      OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE: 1
    volumes:
      - $$cap_appname-config:/config
      - $$cap_appname-books:/books
    caproverExtra:
      containerHttpPort: "8083"

caproverOneClickApp:
  variables:
    - id: $$cap_app_version
      label: Calibre-web
      defaultValue: "0.6.21"
      description: Check out their docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/calibre-web/tags

    - id: $$cap_timezone
      label: Timezone
      defaultValue: "Europe/Berlin"
      description: "See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for list of timezones."

  instructions:
    start: >-
      Calibre-web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an
      existing Calibre database. It is also possible to integrate google drive and edit metadata and your calibre
      library through the app itself.
    end: >-
      Done! ðŸ˜„ Your service is available at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain Default admin login: Username: admin
      Password: admin123
  displayName: "(ARM)Calibre Web"
  isOfficial: false
  description:
    Calibre-web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing
    Calibre database.
  documentation: https://github.com/janeczku/calibre-web
